Title: Relates to computer-related crimes
Summary: Relates to computer-related crimes; creates the crimes unlawful disruption of computer services in the first and second degree, unlawful computer access assistance in the first and second degree, unauthorized use of internet domain name or profile, and unlawful introduction of a computer contaminant; allows for a civil action for compensatory damages for victims of such crimes.
LawCode: Amd Pen L, generally; amd ยง6430, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the education law, in relation to computer-related crimes
